name: Proto04
description:
Game Developed in 4th graduation project of Game Design in Feevale University .

Proto04 is a first-person exploration game where the main character, Phergus, a mecha-human experience of a corporation that violates any kind of humanity for its own benefit, tries to escape the underground having to solve puzzles and avoiding enemies.

Development Team:

3D Stage Artist - Caio Antônio Scherer Rosa
3D Characters Artist - Gabriel Henrique Gomes Born
Interfaces Artist and Sound Designer - Luiz Eduardo Andrade Elias
Programmer and Level Designer - Monique Reis
